pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, February 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island

9:00 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Prince Edward Island, Dennis King.

Office of the Premier
95 Rochford Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Charlottetown, Philip Brown.

Charlottetown City Hall
199 Queen Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:15 a.m.
